description: Number of n-ominoes for a high-dimensional orthoplex.
comments: An orthoplex polyominoes does not extend more than two units along any axis.
example: There are a(5)=5 orthoplex pentominoes: the two 3-D pentominoes that fit in a 2 X 2 X 2 box and the three 4-D pentominoes.
author: _Robert A. Russell_
